title: Net Promoter Score (NPS) Survey
description: A one-question survey measuring how likely customers are to recommend your product or service, plus optional follow-up queries.

intro.title: Help Us Improve
intro.description: We value your opinion and would appreciate your feedback on your experience with our product/service. This will take less than a minute to complete.

nps_rating.title: How likely are you to recommend us to a friend or colleague?
nps_rating.description: On a scale from 0 (Not at all likely) to 10 (Extremely likely)

nps_followup.title: What influenced your score?
nps_followup.description: Your feedback helps us understand what we're doing well and where we can improve.

thank_you.title: Thank You for Your Feedback
thank_you.description: We appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback. Your input is valuable to us as we work to improve our products and services.
